page.title: 13The local youth club
page.content: On a Monday & Friday evening we go to the local youth club which has about 200 members aged from 11 to 17 years. It is a place where you can meet up with your friends and take part in numerous activities. These include playing table tennis, snooker, football and other sports as well as listening to records. Other activities such as horse riding,rock climbing and disco's are also organised and are very popular. Some discos are given a theme, e.g. the Caribbean, where everyone has to dress in the traditional grass skirt and coloured tops, or the Roman Toga when everyone dressed in a Toga, usually made from an old sheet. All these activities are very enjoyable and a good source of recreation.
